title: [RODEN] Japanese Kissa by Kissa, Norm Maclean, Toni Morrison, Akiya in Japan, Howtown, Bobby Fingers, and more
content:
Roden Readers —
Hello from a Japan still on the edge of sweltering! I was standing outside a temple in Yamagata a few nights ago waiting for a friend to finish his mountain ascetic training, just standing at seven p.m., not moving, and jeepers was I soaked, sweat was shooting out of every little hole all over my body. If there was a hole, it was secreting. And none of it was evaporating, which only caused more sweating for my confused body.
